languages.text: "Мастер ван Калокс!" {n}В голосе Кассии звучит неподдельная радость, которую она тут же прячет за дворянской чопорностью.{/n} "Раз вы вновь с нами, то, надеюсь, найдете время завершить нашу беседу о литературных трудах Блаженного Кронхалера".

"Master van Calox!" {n}Cassia's voice is brimming with genuine joy, which she immediately hides behind a facade of highborn primness.{/n} "Since you are with us once more, I do hope you will find time to finish our conversation about the literary works of Kronhaller the Blessed."
languages.original_text: "Мастер ван Калокс!" {n}В голосе Кассии звучит неподдельная радость, которую она тут же прячет за дворянской чопорностью.{/n} "Раз вы вновь с нами, то, надеюсь, найдете время завершить нашу беседу о литературных трудах Блаженного Кронхалера".

traits.locale_text: "Master van Calox!" {n}Cassia's voice is brimming with genuine joy, which she immediately hides behind a facade of highborn primness.{/n} "Since you are with us once more, I do hope you will find time to finish our conversation about the literary works of Kronhaller the Blessed."

"Master van Calox!" {n}Cassia's voice is brimming with genuine joy, which she immediately hides behind a facade of highborn primness.{/n} "Since you are with us once more, I do hope you will find time to finish our conversation about the literary works of Kronhaller the Blessed."

"Master van Calox!" {n}Cassia's voice is brimming with genuine joy, which she immediately hides behind a facade of highborn primness.{/n} "Since you are with us once more, I do hope you will find time to finish our conversation about the literary works of Kronhaller the Blessed."

"Master van Calox!" {n}Cassia's voice is brimming with genuine joy, which she immediately hides behind a facade of highborn primness.{/n} "Since you are with us once more, I do hope you will find time to finish our conversation about the literary works of Kronhaller the Blessed."

"Master van Calox!" {n}Cassia's voice is brimming with genuine joy, which she immediately hides behind a facade of highborn primness.{/n} "Since you are with us once more, I do hope you will find time to finish our conversation about the literary works of Kronhaller the Blessed."

languages.text: 「マスター・ヴァン・カロックス！」{n}カシアの声は純粋な喜びに満ちているが、すぐにハイボーンらしい控えめさを取り戻した。{/n}「せっかく戻ってきてくれたのだから、途中だった祝福されしクロンハラーの文学作品の話の続きをしましょう」
languages.original_text: "Master van Calox!" {n}Cassia's voice is brimming with genuine joy, which she immediately hides behind a facade of highborn primness.{/n} "Since you are with us once more, I do hope you will find time to finish our conversation about the literary works of Kronhaller the Blessed."

traits.locale_text: 「マスター・ヴァン・カロックス！」{n}カシアの声は純粋な喜びに満ちているが、すぐにハイボーンらしい控えめさを取り戻した。{/n}「せっかく戻ってきてくれたのだから、途中だった祝福されしクロンハラーの文学作品の話の続きをしましょう」

languages.text: “冯·卡洛克斯大师！”{n}卡西娅的声音里洋溢着发自内心的喜悦，但随后又立刻把这种喜悦隐藏在高贵端庄的仪态之后。{/n}“既然你又与我们同行了，我真诚地希望你能抽出时间，继续我们上一次关于受祝者克朗哈勒的文学作品的讨论。”
languages.original_text: "Master van Calox!" {n}Cassia's voice is brimming with genuine joy, which she immediately hides behind a facade of highborn primness.{/n} "Since you are with us once more, I do hope you will find time to finish our conversation about the literary works of Kronhaller the Blessed."

traits.locale_text: “冯·卡洛克斯大师！”{n}卡西娅的声音里洋溢着发自内心的喜悦，但随后又立刻把这种喜悦隐藏在高贵端庄的仪态之后。{/n}“既然你又与我们同行了，我真诚地希望你能抽出时间，继续我们上一次关于受祝者克朗哈勒的文学作品的讨论。”

languages.text: «¡Maestro van Calox!». {n}La voz de Cassia rebosa una alegría genuina que enseguida oculta tras una mojigatería propia de noble alcurnia.{/n} «Ya que nos vuelve a acompañar, espero que encuentre un hueco para zanjar nuestra conversación sobre las obras literarias de Kronhaller el Bendito».
languages.original_text: "Master van Calox!" {n}Cassia's voice is brimming with genuine joy, which she immediately hides behind a facade of highborn primness.{/n} "Since you are with us once more, I do hope you will find time to finish our conversation about the literary works of Kronhaller the Blessed."

traits.locale_text: «¡Maestro van Calox!». {n}La voz de Cassia rebosa una alegría genuina que enseguida oculta tras una mojigatería propia de noble alcurnia.{/n} «Ya que nos vuelve a acompañar, espero que encuentre un hueco para zanjar nuestra conversación sobre las obras literarias de Kronhaller el Bendito».

languages.text: « Maître van Calox ! » {n}La voix de Cassia déborde d'une joie sincère qu'elle cache immédiatement derrière un masque de correction plus approprié à son rang.{/n} « Puisque vous êtes de retour parmi nous, j'espère que vous trouverez le temps de terminer notre conversation sur les œuvres littéraires de Kronhaller le Béni. »
languages.original_text: "Master van Calox!" {n}Cassia's voice is brimming with genuine joy, which she immediately hides behind a facade of highborn primness.{/n} "Since you are with us once more, I do hope you will find time to finish our conversation about the literary works of Kronhaller the Blessed."

traits.locale_text: « Maître van Calox ! » {n}La voix de Cassia déborde d'une joie sincère qu'elle cache immédiatement derrière un masque de correction plus approprié à son rang.{/n} « Puisque vous êtes de retour parmi nous, j'espère que vous trouverez le temps de terminer notre conversation sur les œuvres littéraires de Kronhaller le Béni. »

languages.text: "Meister van Calox!" {n}In Cassias Stimme liegt ehrliche Freude, die sie sofort hinter einer Fassade hochgeborener Geziertheit versteckt.{/n} "Da Ihr wieder bei uns seid, findet Ihr hoffentlich Zeit, um unser Gespräch über das literarische Wirken von Kronhaller den Gesegneten zu beenden."
languages.original_text: "Master van Calox!" {n}Cassia's voice is brimming with genuine joy, which she immediately hides behind a facade of highborn primness.{/n} "Since you are with us once more, I do hope you will find time to finish our conversation about the literary works of Kronhaller the Blessed."

traits.locale_text: "Meister van Calox!" {n}In Cassias Stimme liegt ehrliche Freude, die sie sofort hinter einer Fassade hochgeborener Geziertheit versteckt.{/n} "Da Ihr wieder bei uns seid, findet Ihr hoffentlich Zeit, um unser Gespräch über das literarische Wirken von Kronhaller den Gesegneten zu beenden."

languages.text: "Üstat van Calox!" {n}Cassia'nın sesi sahici bir neşeyle dolu olsa da kadın hemen onu soylu bir resmiyet perdesi ardına gizliyor.{/n} "Bir kez daha bir araya geldiğimize göre Kutsanmış Kronhaller'ın edebî eserleri konusundaki muhabbetimizi sonlandırmaya vakit bulabileceğimizi umuyorum."
languages.original_text: "Master van Calox!" {n}Cassia's voice is brimming with genuine joy, which she immediately hides behind a facade of highborn primness.{/n} "Since you are with us once more, I do hope you will find time to finish our conversation about the literary works of Kronhaller the Blessed."

traits.locale_text: "Üstat van Calox!" {n}Cassia'nın sesi saf bir mutlulukla doluyor ama bu mutluluk hemen sahte bir soylu resmiyetine bürünüyor.{/n} "Bir kez daha bir araya geldiğimize göre Kutsal Kronhaller'ın edebî eserleri konusundaki muhabbetimizi sonlandırmak için vakit ayırabileceğinizi umuyorum."
